branchCategory.name: NC(D)M-A, Stainless Steel Body Cylinder w/Adjustable Air Cushion
branchCategory.description: <p>Air cushion double acting single rod version of our NCM stainless steel cylinders. A wear ring extends the seal life and a bronze rod bushing is standard on all bore sizes. The NCM is available in 3 mounting styles (front nose, double end, rear pivot). The NCM is auto-switch capable without any change in cylinder dimension. Bore sizes range from 3/4" to 2" and standard strokes from 1/2" to 12". </p>

breadCrumb.name: Stainless Steel Body w/Adjustable Air Cushion
